summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Wav2Vec2 speech model’s configuration, initialization, forward behavior, training and inference pipelines, masking mechanisms, token embedding resizing, adapter integration, gradient handling, and cross‑framework equivalence between PyTorch and Flax implementations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the Wav2Vec2 model for production speech‑recognition applications, supporting seamless deployment across different libraries and ensuring new features such as adapters and masking work as intended.
